name: inventor_sequence
description: order in which the inventors are listed in the raw XML for current patent; sequence for this table begins at {0}.

name: inventor_id
description: unique inventor id generated by the disambiguation algorithm

name: deceased_flag
description: flag to indicate if the inventor has deceased

name: rawlocation_id
description: inventor's location. If the inventor's sequence number is 0, then his/her location is the "location" of the related patent
